description: From the ManufacturerHigh-performance digital audio for PC calling, music, and gaming.Laser-tuned audio drivers deliver premium acoustic performance. Headset-based, SoundSwitch™ equalizer offers three presets, which instantly optimize audio for Internet communications, music, or PC gaming.A rotating, noise-canceling microphone puts the focus on your voice by reducing background chatter, and easy-access volume and mute controls on the headset let you quickly adjust audio.Features PerformanceLaser-tuned audio drivers: Advanced laser design technology maximizes acoustic performance.SoundSwitch™ equalizer: Instantly optimizes EQ settings for Internet communications, music, or PC gaming. Convenient control switch located on headset.      Control and ConvenienceNoise-canceling microphone: Reduces background noise for clear conversation and voice commands.Flexible boom: Allows precise positioning. Microphone rotates out of the way when you’re listening to music or watching a movie.Mute indicator: Microphone emits soft, red glow when muted.Quick-access audio controls on the headset: Instantly adjust the volume or mute the microphone.Digitally enhanced USB audio: Experience premium sound clarity with the simplicity of a single USB, plug-and-play connection. Elevate the Power of Windows Vista™System RequirementsPCWindows® 2000, Windows® XP, Windows Vista™USB portMacMac OS® X (10.2.8 or later)USB portTechnical SpecificationsFrequency response:Headset: 20 Hz–20 kHzMicrophone: 100 Hz–10 kHzInput sensitivity: -62 dBV/µbar, -42 dBV/Pa +/- 3 dBCable length: 8 feetConnections: USB compatible (1.1 and 2.0)Package ContentsLogitech® ClearChat Pro USB™Quick-Start Guide2-year limited hardware warranty
title: Logitech ClearChat Pro USB Headset
